stepAnswer: $$\frac{y^2 cos\left(x y\right)}{2y-sin\left(x y\right)-x y cos\left(x y\right)}$$
stepTitle: For $$y sin\left(xy\right)=y^2+2$$, use implicit differentiation to find $$\frac{dy}{dx}$$.
